/usr/bin/curl
root@4fc003d2d497:/app# ls -l /usr/bin/curl; tmux wait -S done
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 46 Jul 15 00:22 /usr/bin/curl
root@4fc003d2d497:/app# curl -I example.com; tmux wait -S done
DNS resolution error
root@4fc003d2d497:/app# cat /etc/resolv.conf; tmux wait -S done

# This file can be edited; Docker Engine will not make further changes once it
# has been modified.

search local us-central1-c.c.memgpt-428419.internal c.memgpt-428419.internal google.internal
options edns0 trust-ad ndots:0

# ExtServers: [host(127.0.0.53)]
# Overrides: []
# Option ndots from: internal
